title: I was placed on AFK low priority queue for no reason
body:
During game I was lagging and I restarted my modem to fix it and I reconnected and played with my friend until the matched ended about 5 minutes after I reconnected, I didn't get any kills because I was so behind but I farmed as much as possible to catchup and after the game it put me on AFK queue and I've never even gone afk or left a game what the heck riot I am so mad right now this isn't cool my friend doesnt want to wait 10 minutes in between games what the F*** 

And I was thinking about getting some RP for the new champ, now I'm not because how irritated I am.

replies.body: The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat all leaves equally even if it was not intentional, because all leaves causes other players a negative experience.  I highly recommend working towards whatever is causing you to leave, as the only way to restore your standing with the system is by consistent play.  Let me know if you have any questions or need assistance with that.

Thanks Porocles. 

Like the name.

[...] Sorry mate, still dissatisfied with how I was placed on Low Priority Queue, although I'm glad the system is in place to prevent AFK, I mean I hate it even when my enemy team has an AFK. 

I know the general consensus could agree the Leaverbuster system isn't perfect yet, and I know you guys are still fine tuning it, hopefully this goes to show that Murphy's Law is still in place :-)
